channel.title: #sxcd2018
channel.description: @elotroalex reads "the other Alex" in Spanish. Although the handler carries hints of Borges, Marti and the big Other, I get it mostly from my grandmother Flor. Every time I misbehaved she used to say: "Yo se que no fuiste tu, mijo. Fue el otro Alex." Let's say I keep it as a reminder of the playful mischief of grace.
